display_long_description:
Explore your skills and stamina with this high-octane action sports game set to a pulse-racing soundtrack. Set your highest scores then challenge your friends to beat them! 

Orbeats will transport you to forgotten alien worlds where you must navigate through ancient alien temples. Your only tools are your racket, your laser and gravity tether, which you will need to defeat the incoming waves of alien defence systems. As you explore deeper, you will encounter dangerous temple guardians who protect the ancient ruins.

Master the rhythm, feel the adrenaline rush, and your muscles pump as you explore new environments & play great dance tunes.

AEROBIC GAMEPLAY
Orbeats can be played seated or standing. Fight hordes of aliens while you exercise to the rhythm of music in fast-paced scenarios where gameplay and traditional sports intertwine.


CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS
Prove your worth against other players, climb the ladders, and become the best in the world.


BEAT THE MUSIC
Explore the exciting pace of each level that drives attacks at you to the beat of the music. Master the challenges of the ancient lands that strive to drive off your attacks.


EASY TO LEARN, HARD TO MASTER
Harness power-ups as you explore ancient temples, battle fabled guardians, and learn new tricks to improve your scores and abilities.
